column3: Ne peult point demander la légitimation.

column2: A crusade has recently been called and another cannot be called until this timer wears out.

column2: This character cannot initiate or be the target of a war until this modifier wears off.
column3: Ce personnage ne peult point initier ou estre la cible d'une guerre jusqu'à ce que ce modificateur se dissipe.
column4: Dieser Person kann weder das Ziel eines Krieges, noch einen Krieg starten, bis dieser Modifikator nachlässt.
column6: This character cannot initiate or be the target of a war until this modifier wears off.

column2: A loan will be due for repayment at the expiration date of this modifier.
column3: Un emprunt devra estre remboursé à la date d'expiration de ce modificateur.
column4: Ein Darlehen muss mit Ablauf dieses Modifikators zurückgezahlt werden
column6: A loan will be due for repayment at the expiration date of this modifier.
